## User-defined Type

letâ€™s create a `struct` to represent scientific open source programming languages. 

```{julia}
struct Language
    name::String
    title::String
    year_of_birth::Int64
    fast::Bool
end
```


Access field names

```{julia}
fieldnames(Language)
```

Initiate objects (immutable)

```{julia}
julia = Language("Julia", "Rapidus", 2012, true)
R = Language("R", "R & R", 1993, false)
```

```{julia}
typeof(julia)
```

Accessing individual values

```{julia}
julia.name
R.name
```
